Pura Luxe Smoothing Treatment is non-toxic, natural, keratin, sulphate and formaldehyde-free formulation that promises to eliminate or significantly reduce frizz while delivering straighter, smoother and stronger hair. Formulated with natural proteins and essential oils, the protein contained in the Pura Luxe treatment penetrates through to the hair’s cortex while the essential fatty oils wrap and protect the hair from day-to-day elements that our hair endures.

Pura Luxa’s patented, revolutionary formulations contain six types of amino acids that straighten the hair by transforming the internal textural memory of the hair. The presence of the amino acids in this smoothing treatment creates hair that is rich in Keratin, making it smooth and shiny while improving the condition of the hair with prolonged use. It is considered to be safer alternative to traditional Keratin treatments.

The Pura Luxe Smoothing difference:

  • Pura Luxe is a non-toxic amino based system, meaning there is no formaldehyde or toxic fumes.
  • Unlike traditional smoothing treatments that last 2-3 months, Pura Luxe smoothing delivers results for up to six months.
  • Pura Luxe clients can have their hair coloured or washed as soon as they please after having the treatment, as opposed to the 5-7 day down time of Keratin treatments.
  • The Pura Luxe Smoothing System and it Amino Building Blocker technology penetrates the hair allowing the bonds to stretch. Prolonged use of the treatment will actually improve the strength, shine and overall feel of the hair

All bookings, consultations and general enquiries can be arranged either by phone, online or with the Luxe staff in the salon.
